title: French doors lead to an intimate flagstone patio and garden to enjoy y
description:
Exceptional, carefree living right in the heart of desirable Ardmore! Originally built by renowned Main Line builder B.J. Drueding Builders, this is a rare opportunity to rent a fabulous, spacious 1 bedroom/1.5 bath end-unit condo in a walk-to everything location. Enter through the marble foyer to gleaming Brazilian Cherry hardwood floors that flow throughout. You'll enjoy effortless entertaining with a gourmet kitchen, designed with Brookhaven cabinets, stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Adjacent to the kitchen is the dining room, ready for your family and guests. French doors lead to an intimate flagstone patio and garden to enjoy your morning coffee or an evening cocktail. The living room is spacious and airy, highlighted by a slate surround wood-burning fireplace, built-in cabinetry, shelving and bay window. The bright and spacious master suite is complete with walk-in closet, luxurious master bath with limestone vanity and large seamless glass shower. Special upgrades include all new energy efficient windows and sliding glass doors, updated HVAC, two new patios with exterior lighting, overhead cooling fans, new outside landscaping and hardwood floors throughout. For your convenience, you'll also find a laundry area with stackable washer and dryer. This well-situated condo includes two designated parking spaces, one in the enclosed garage, as well as a large storage unit. Enjoy the quiet and convenience of your new home as it is located within walking distance from Lower Merion HS, Suburban Square, Trader Joes and the Ardmore Farmer's Market. The nearby Ardmore train station provides Septa and Amtrak service to Center City, NY or Washington D.C. so that you may indulge in the best of the suburbs and easy access to the city.

title: you will LOVE living on Iseminger!
description:
Situated on a quiet, sweet street in Washington Square West, 410 S Iseminger ticks all the boxes of trinity living. This two-bedroom, one-bathroom home features TWO outdoor spaces and has been beautifully updated for both modern comfort and historic preservation. Just through the front door, you’re greeted with a quaint living room with a well-maintained original fireplace and coat closet. Making your way downstairs, you’ll find the renovated kitchen with cellar door access to the street (for unloading groceries) and outdoor space. The kitchen has all new appliances, a new backsplash, and repointed exposed brick walls. The back patio is the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or work outside during a warm day. The first bedroom is found on the second floor of the home. Down the hall is the full bath featuring heated floors, a new toilet, and a new vanity. On the third floor of this trinity is the second bedroom with beautiful vaulted ceilings and exposed beams. Off of this bedroom is a little balcony. With two outdoor spaces, original hardwood floors, a basement for storage, central air, and close proximity to all your Center City favorites, you will LOVE living on Iseminger.

title: Wonderful 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom single family home!
description:
Available NOW: Welcome to 244 S Warnock St! This is a wonderful 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom single family home in the heart of walkable Washington Square West. Enjoy the convenience of in-unit laundry and central air for year-round comfort. Your living room welcomes you home with a sun-soaked atmosphere and a decorative fireplace with mantle and built-in shelving. Continue back to your gorgeous kitchen boasting tile flooring, wood cabinetry above and below, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, microwave, gas oven / stove, and refrigerator. Head upstairs to the 2nd Floor to view 2 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom, and then to the primary suite on the 3rd Floor. This large primary bedroom offers abundant sunlight, good closet space, and an attached full bathroom for a luxurious lifestyle. There's a sizable brick patio for entertaining guests in the warmer months - schedule a tour today! About The Neighborhood: Washington Square West is a walkable neighborhood surrounded by convenient shopping, public transportation, and nightlife options. You'll be just a few blocks from City Hall, iconic South Street, Pennsylvania Hospital, Washington Square, Independence Hall, and the Walnut Street Theater. Close proximity to PATCO, Jefferson Station, the Broad Street Line, the Market-Frankford El Line, and ample bus routes. There are tons of local eatery and hotspots within small radius of this great home including Middle Child, Greenstreete Coffee, Little Nonna's, Strangelove's, Monster Vegan, Mixto, Dirty Frank's, Green Egg's Cafe, Yellowtail, and countless more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Strictly, no pets. Tenants responsible for: electricity, gas, cable/internet, and water. Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, credit history to be considered (i.e. no active collections), no evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history with on-time rental payments. Exceptions to this criteria may exist under the law and will be considered.
